item.title: Untaxed Car abandoned on Dorset Road Allotments, 23rd February
item.description:
This car has been on our site since October. Our members do not know who it belongs to or who parked it on our site. It is on a locked allotment site.

item.category: Street Light - Equipment damaged, pole leaning

item.title: Pothole, 23rd February
item.description:
I am writing to raise a formal complaint regarding the condition of the road in my area. There are multiple potholes and a large amount of loose small stones that have been left on the road for several weeks without being cleaned. This is extremely dangerous, especially for cyclists and motorcyclists. As a cyclist, I have already had my bicycle tyre damaged twice because of the potholes and loose stones. This situation is unacceptable and poses a serious safety risk. Someone could easily lose control and be seriously injured. I kindly request that this issue is inspected and resolved as a matter of urgency. Please confirm when the road will be repaired and cleaned.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kidbrooke Park Road, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking my doors for the back yard., 23rd February
item.description:
Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to inform you about an issue that is currently blocking access to our rear yard for more than a week. Due to the damage/obstruction, we are unable to enter the back yard as usual. This is causing inconvenience and may present a safety concern. I have attached photographs to clearly show the situation. I kindly ask that this matter be reviewed and resolved as soon as possible. Please let us know when we can expect the issue to be addressed. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. Kind regards, Sonata

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drummond Close, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
